descriptions: New Feature: Player Selection for Shared Anims - When selecting a shared animation with multiple people nearby, you can now choose exactly who to play the animation with (no longer random selection).
New Feature: Localization - Added French translation.
Improvement: Sound System - Recoded the sound system to prevent even more cache issues.
Improvement: Cloned Peds - Addressed issues where right-clicking an animation would not show the cloned ped.
Improvement: Controls - You can now use the 'X' key to cancel Animation Positioning (in addition to ESC).
Bug Fix - Fixed an issue where keybinds were not saving correctly.
Bug Fix - Fixed an issue preventing Numpad keybinds from being added while Num Lock is enabled.
